ai-tha-ap292:1.2_0: the go forth and the lay life,
ai-tha-ap292:1.4_0: for the attainment of the highest goal.
ai-tha-ap292:2.1_0: But if they’re greedy for future lives,
ai-tha-ap292:3.1_0: For who has ended the defilements,
ai-tha-ap292:3.2_0: she has completed the task and is free of defilements.
ai-tha-ap292:3.3_0: They decorated with a mind of love,
ai-tha-ap292:3.4_0: as the level of the bad.
ai-tha-ap292:5.2_0: to the company of the virtuous,
ai-tha-ap292:5.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap292:5.4_0: since it is the fruit of perception.
ai-tha-ap292:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap292:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Jāliya.
ai-tha-ap292:8.1_0: for the senior ones, the tenthors of the senior Vedas,
ai-tha-ap292:9.1_0: The group of one hundred on the banks of the river.
